code: public static <T> T doPrivileged(PrivilegedAction<T> operation) {     SpecialPermission.check().     return AccessController.doPrivileged(operation). }

public static <T> T doPrivilegedIOException(PrivilegedExceptionAction<T> operation) throws IOException {     SpecialPermission.check().     try {         return AccessController.doPrivileged(operation).     } catch (PrivilegedActionException e) {         throw (IOException) e.getCause().     } }
